description: I like to learn new technologies and I'm constantly involved in trainings and hackathons. These are a few of the technologies I've tried outside my day job.

responsibilities.content: __Hackathon__: Developed an [embedded application](https://github.com/orgs/golang-iot/dashboard) with Golang to retrieve pictures from a Raspberry Pi and send them to AWS Rekognition for facial recognition.
Created a blog about Serverless applications, hosted at [Medium](https://medium.com/a-man-with-no-server).
__Hackathon__: Developed an Angular application to visualize relationships between people stored in a Neo4J database, and displaying the data through a D3 data graph
